testcase.classname: Test CRUD methods in Sample Employee REST API testing
testcase.name: Add Employee record
testcase.system-out: Given I set POST employee service api endpoint as https://reqres.in/........passed And I create a request and enter Kartik and Engineer........................passed When I pass the request and /api/users......................................passed Then I check the reponse by 201.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Test CRUD methods in Sample Employee REST API testing
testcase.name: UPDATE Employee record
testcase.system-out: Given I set PUT employee service api endpoint as https://reqres.in/.........passed And I create a put request and enter updated Somesh and Software Engineer...passed When I pass the put request and /api/users/2................................passed Then I check the put response by 200........................................passed

testcase.classname: Test CRUD methods in Sample Employee REST API testing
testcase.name: GET Employee record
testcase.system-out: Given I set GET employee service api endpoints as https://reqres.in/........passed When I create a get request and pass the /api/users/2.......................passed Then I check the get response by 200........................................passed

testcase.classname: Test CRUD methods in Sample Employee REST API testing
testcase.name: DELETE Employee record
testcase.system-out: Given I set DELETE employee service api endpoint as https://reqres.in/......passed When I create DELETE HTTP request and pass the /api/users/2.................passed Then I check the DELETE response by 204.....................................passed
